com.bws.jdistil.core.resource
Class ResourceUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.bws.jdistil.core.resource.ResourceUtil

public class ResourceUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class providing resource lookup services on the default or any specified resource bundle.

Author:
- Bryan Snipes

Field Summary
protected static java.lang.String className
          Class name attribute used in messaging.
 
Method Summary
static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle()
          Returns the core resource bundle.
static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle(java.lang.String resourceName)
          Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name.  If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.
static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle(java.lang.String resourceName, java.util.Locale locale)
          Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name and locale.
static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle(java.lang.String resourceName, java.util.Locale locale, java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
          Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name, locale, and class loader.

          Returns an enumeration of resource bundle keys based on a given resource name, locale, and class loader.

getBundle

public static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle()
Returns the core resource bundle.

Returns:
ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.

getBundle

public static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle(java.lang.String resourceName)
Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name.  If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.

Parameters:
resourceName - - Resource bundle name.
Returns:
ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.

getBundle

public static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                                 java.util.Locale locale)
Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name and locale. If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.

Parameters:
resourceName - - Resource bundle name.
locale - - Locale.
Returns:
ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.

getBundle

public static java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                                 java.util.Locale locale,
                                                 java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
Returns a resource bundle using a given resource name, locale, and class loader. If the provided resource name contains a comma delimited list of resource bundle names, a MergedResource bundle containing the contents of all resource bundles defined in the list is returned.

Parameters:
resourceName - - Resource bundle name.
locale - - Locale.
loader - - Class loader.
Returns:
ResourceBundle - Resource bundle.
